applyLoss(uint256).details: Apply loss using waterfall structure (Junior  Mezz  Senior)

constructor.details: Constructor initializes the vault with USDC token

deposit(uint256,uint8).details: Deposit USDC into a specific tranche

params.amount: Amount of USDC to deposit (must be approved first)
params.t: Tranche to deposit into (Senior, Mezz, or Junior)

getSharePrice(uint8).details: Get share price for a specific tranche

getTrancheValues().details: Get virtual values of all three tranches

getUserShares(address,uint8).details: Get user's shares in a specific tranche

getUserValue(address,uint8).details: Get user's virtual USDC value in a specific tranche

returns._0: User's virtual USDC value in the tranche

totalVaultValue().details: Get total virtual vault value across all tranches

updateEpoch(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: Update epoch with new scoring data and apply returns to tranches

withdraw(uint256,uint8).details: Withdraw USDC from a specific tranche

applyLoss(uint256).notice: Loss hits Junior first, then Mezz, then SeniorOnly owner can call this (or it's called automatically in updateEpoch)

deposit(uint256,uint8).notice: Mints shares based on current tranche share priceFirst depositor sets seed values (1:1 ratio)

updateEpoch(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Only owner can call this functionComputes combined score and applies differential returns to each tranche

withdraw(uint256,uint8).notice: Converts shares into virtual USDC based on current tranche valueTransfers real USDC to user
